# Tavlefil til forelesning 1

Risikopremie

$rp=\frac{P_{t}+Div-P_{0}}{P_{0}}$

\begin{equation}
E(rp) = \sum_{s=1}^{S}Pr(s)X(s) =
Pr(1)X(1) + Pr(2)X(2) + ... + Pr(S)X(S) 
\end{equation}

\begin{equation}
E(rp) = \sum_{i=1}^{N}w_{i}E(X_{i}) =
w_{1}E(X_{1})+w_{2}E(X_{2})+...+w_{N}E(X_{N})
\end{equation}
